channel.title: MAT 219 - Data Science I on MAT 219 Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in MAT 219 - Data Science I on MAT 219 Data Science

item.description: Note: This page will be updated throughout the semester. Date Lesson Slides Readings R-HW DS-HW Project Week 01 Mon, Jan 22 Introduction to Data Science Wed, Jan 24 Meet The Tools and Visualization Intro Fri, Jan 26 Visualization Intro cont. Week 02 Mon, Jan 29 Visualization Part 2, Functions Wed, Jan 31 Fundamentals of Visualizations Fri, Feb 2 Data Manipulation Basics Week 03 Mon, Jan 30 Visualization Part 2 and Functions Wed, Feb 1 Functions and Data Manipulation Fri, Feb 3 Week 04 Mon, Feb 06 Data Manipulation With dplyr and tidyr Wed, Feb 08 Exploring dplyr Fri, Feb 10 Data Manipulation With tidyr Week 05 Mon, Feb 13 Potpourri Of Topics (readr, Relational Data) Wed, Feb 16 Exploring GEC Grade Data Fri, Feb 18 Relational Data and String Manipulation Week 06 Mon, Feb 20 String Manipulation and Regex's Wed, Feb 22 String Manipulation and Regex's Fri, Feb 24 Regex's Week 07 Mon, Feb 27 Web Scraping Wed, Mar 1 Web Scraping and Data Cleaning Activity Fri, Mar 3 Web Scraping March 6th, 8th and 10th Week 08: Spring Break March 13th Week 09 March 15th Week 10 March 20th EDA Process and Discussion March 24th Work Day March 27th Stats Primer March 29th Stat Primer Cont.
